title: [Large-scale] Designing a Professional Development Program for Pakistani Secondary Teachers Based on Cultural Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Teacher Professionalism and Cultural Competence
context.additional_context: Culturally responsive design referencing US-based adult education programs, including intercultural communication strategies for understanding Pakistan's educational environment

learning_goals: Demonstrate competency in designing culturally contextualized lessons reflecting Pakistani cultural contexts in at least three case studies
Achieve over 80% appropriateness in peer feedback using a culture-competency-based assessment rubric
Gain experience in establishing teacher collaboration networks in blended (online/offline) environments at least twice
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
